institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 5 (Establishment and implementation of business plan)
contents: Article 5 (Establishment and implementation of business plan) ① The chairman of the board shall establish a business plan for the following year by the end of December every year. ② The Chairman may entrust and implement some of the projects under Paragraph 1 to external professional organizations and experts. ③ If entrusted in accordance with Paragraph 2, the related costs may be supported to the operating organizations and experts within the scope of the budget.
